pages.text: 109|5|naega gyeongbaehan geubun-eul neohuiga gyeongbaehaji anh-eul geos-ini
109|6|neohuiegeneun neohuiui jong-gyoga issgo na-egeneun naui jong-gyoga iss-eul ppun-ila
110|2|ttejieo hananim-ui jong-gyolo gwiuihaneun baegseongdeul-eul geudaeneun bolini
110|3|junim-eul chanmihago junimkke gwan-yong-eul guhala sillo geubun-eun gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasinila
111|2|geuui jaemulgwa geuga eod-eun geos-i geuege yuighaji moshani
111|3|geuneun god taoleuneun boljiog-e ileuge doel geos-ila
